Package javelin.controller.terrain.hazard

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Break
    Carriages are fragile vehicles and prone to breaking.
    Cold
    Frostbite.
    Dehydration
    Damages characters if Squad has no resource reserves (gold) left.
    FallingTrees
    During a storm a tree may fall - it's easy to avoid but causes massive damage otherwise.
    Flood
    Can happen during any storm or in spring time if it's raining.
    GettingLost
    A party that is lost will wander around and waste time.
    Hazard  
    Heat
    Extreme heat.
    Ice
    Ship gets stuck on ice for 24h.
    PartyHazard
    This is a helper class for hazard effects that affect all squad members.
    Rockslide
    Takes a single creature (or the whole vehicle) downhill.
    Storm
    A storm on the sea will throw everything about, but not destroy it.
